role.argrole: thing arg0 investigates and makes sure about

example.parse: (IP (PP-DIR (P 对) (NP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VP (VP (VV 隐瞒)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 报)))) (PU 、) (VP (VP-FOC (VV 制止)) (VP (DVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 力)))))) (DEC 的))))) (PU ，) (PP-MNR (ADVP (AD 一)) (PP (P 经) (NP (NN 查实)))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (VV 要) (VP (ADVP (AD 严肃)) (VP (VV 处理)))))
example.arg: 对 *OP* *T*-1 隐瞒 不 报 、 制止 不 力 的
